about_the_game:
• Unique armored car: ‘Last aid’;
  • Epic autocannon ‘AC72 Whirlwind’;
  • Unique rare cabin ‘Hot Rod’;
  • Unique horn ‘Ambulance blinker’;
  • Unique structural parts ‘Hot Rod’;
  • Unique hero portrait: Mortus;
  • Unique sticker ‘Snake Venom’;
  • Paint can: ‘Plague’;
  • Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55;
  • 1500 in-game coins.


Spent many weaks trying to treat those who'd contracted the disease known as Crossout the cure was never found. Seen enough and heard enough from the dying people to lose his mind. Now he can hear voices calling for help and see things that are not really there (or the others somehow didn't notice them?). Now Mortus believes that life in general, and humanity in particular — is a disease that struck the Earth. And he does everything in his power to finally cure the planet.
The ambulance, that Mortus used to transport the sick and for many years, proved to be useful even after the disaster. Its appearance and purpose changed to suit its owner's new needs. This car has become a harbinger of death in the Wasteland, even noticing it from a far promises imminent demise. If the good doctor hears a call for help, he spares no one. So be quiet, no matter how much it hurts.


Unique armored vehicles presented in packs, are particularly well-balanced in their weapons, armor quality and speed in combat. To put the car in the garage, after launching the game, open the blueprints menu (the ‘B’ key), go to the ‘Packs’ tab, select the required armored car and click the ‘Load’ button.

When you buy this pack, the number of parts that can be used to create the vehicles increases to 55.

Also, the purchase of the pack gives the player early access to some structural parts. Some parts can only be in a single copy. When purchasing multiple packs, such items are not duplicated.

Unique portraits are a great opportunity to stand out among the survivors.

Paint cans are a way to make your armored car unlike the others.

Coins are an in-game currency, that is used in the market for purchasing armored vehicle parts from other users and for paying rent for the part-producing faction workshops. Attention! When purchasing multiple packs, the coins stack!

name: Crossout - Pandemic Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 (SP1) / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10 64-bit/ Windows® 11
  • Processor: 4-core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A D3D11-compatible GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 (SP1) / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10 64-bit/ Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5 3600 and higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1060 or Radeon RX 570 and higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

supported_languages: English, Russian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Thai, French
